Others: DJ Herz pitched 5 hitless frames against the Pittsburgh Pirates
Herz finished with 5 strikeouts to 3 walks on 87 pitches
Herz's final strikeout was a swinging strike three on a four-seamer well into the other batter's box
Pirates manager Derek Shelton commented on Herz's performance
Herz gave credit to his changeup for his success
Herz has had a taste of a no-hitter before
Herz is having his innings monitored closely this season
Herz is a much more complete pitcher now vs. then
Herz's numbers are showing his continued progress at the MLB level
